item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-13
item.description: Microsoft Teamsâ€™ Walkie Talkie feature now available to everyone (2 minute read) Walkie-Talkie, a feature that lets Microsoft Teams users turn their mobile and tablet devices into a walkie-talkie that works over cellular data or Wi-Fi, is now available for all users.
